About.Name: Jacob Miller
About.Currently: Computer Science Student at Seattle Pacific University
About.AboutText:
Hi, I’m Jacob Miller, a full-stack software engineer and Computer Science student from Seattle Pacific University. I’m passionate about building user-focused software that balances intuitive design with robust functionality.

Previously, I worked as a Junior Engineer at 3NUM, I’ve contributed to multiple projects in their identity and messaging suite, working across the stack, participating in agile standups via Slack, and delivering features through Linear-based sprint planning.

I co-developed WinterArk, a cross-platform fitness app built with Flutter and Node.js, featuring workout tracking, roast reminders, a social reels page, and real-time chat. I worked on both frontend and backend, including secure API design and background task handling.

I thrive in fast-paced, collaborative teams where I can design, code, and continuously improve products. From Flutter interfaces to scalable Node.js backends, I care about clean code, team feedback, and building things that work beautifully.

Experience.ExperienceText: Over the last year, I’ve collaborated with teams of engineers to deliver full-stack applications with real-world usage. From building REST APIs and handling WebSocket events to crafting user interfaces in Flutter, I’ve worked across the stack to ship polished features and solve technical challenges with efficiency and focus.
Experience.EducationText: Completed coursework in Software Engineering, Data Structures, Systems Design, Operating Systems, Database Management, Computer networks, Cybersecurity and Algorithm Design and Analysis. Consistently applied academic learning to real-world projects like WinterArk and 3NUM Messenger REPL.
Experience.EmploymentText: Junior Engineer at a startup tech company, I work primarily as a full-stack developer with a focus on front-end development. I have contributed to multiple projects and am actively involved in the development of the 3NUM product suite. In addition to coding, I regularly participate in team meetings via Slack. The meetings discuss task planning, where we review upcoming tasks in Linear, share progress on current work, and demo completed features to gather feedback and improve our product.
Skills: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flutter, Dart
Experience.SkillsText: Skilled in building full-stack applications with RESTful APIs, real-time data handling, mobile development in Flutter, and backend logic using Node.js and MongoDB.

Project1.Title: WinterArk – Social Fitness App
Project1.Desc: Cross-platform mobile app built with Flutter and Node.js, featuring workout planning, roast notifications, a gym buddy system with chat, and gamified streaks. Includes reminders, planned workouts, shared dashboards, and a reels page for community content.

Project2.Title: Messenger REPL – 3NUM
Project2.Desc: Built a REPL-based interface in Node.js for real-time interaction with the 3NUM messaging API. Integrated WebSocket communication to handle events like messages, shields, and onboarding events. Includes command-based querying and testing tools for developers.
